ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:17:02 [Issue ID 4000-129437] urn:comicvine:4000-129437 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:33:23. [Issue ID 165277]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Parody of Star Wars: Episode I — The Phantom Menace.
A cynical look at justice, driving, school, service, education, employment, relationships, libraries, fashions, therapy, the office, scheduling, and doctors.
Sergio Aragones' textless Gags spoofing the hype of Episode I.
Monroe goes to a midnight screening of Episode I and walks out because it sucked then goes into the next theatre showing The Rocky Horror Picture Show and gets an idea on how to enjoy the rest of the Star Wars Travesity.
Duck Edwing's ongoing duck side gag page.
Satire on how politics, wrestling and Jerry Springer are pretty much one and the same.
Sergio Aragones' gags featuring scenes from Phantom Menace.
Poetry from celebrities.

ComicInfo.Title: Star Bores: Epic Load I — The Fandumb Megamess; The Lighter Side of...; A Mad Look at Episode I — The Phantom Menace Hype; Monroe and… the Midnight Movie; Gigglin's Island; Mad's Guide to Telling The Difference Between Pro Wrestling, Jerry Springer and Politics; A Mad Look at The Phantom Menace; When Other Celebrities Jump on the Poetry Bandwagon; Detroit Rock Sissies
